column4: I have installed ubuntu Server edition 5-6 times now, and i cant get it to work. when im finish with installing ubuntu, and press finish and the computer restarts. then i get a message "Reboot and select proper boot device or insert boot media in selected boot device and press a key" can anyone help me
does grub load?
make sure your bios is set to boot the correct hdd
it is set to the right HD.
ill trye
think i got the problem. i cant get my hard-drive to be the primary one.Â¨
doesnt matter, you select the bootable hard drive in bios
the same message apears all the time.
if grub doesnt boot, its a bios setting issue and not ubuntu
